Entries.summer_10: Dear @,^Tomorrow we're all gathering at the beach for the annual Pelican Town Beachside Potluck.^^The highlight of the event is the communal soup. Make sure you bring something good to contribute!^The governor himself is attending the event, so make sure you're on your best behavior.^Come to the beach sometime between 9 AM and 2 PM.^   -Mayor Lewis[#]Beachside Potluck Notice

Changes.LogName: Beachside Potluck Lewis Start Soup Tasting

Entries.Event.cs.1527: $q -1 null#Should we move forward with the Potluck? The governor seems a little hungry.#$r -1 0 yes#Yes, let's start.#$r -1 0 no#Not yet.

Changes.LogName: Beachside Potluck Governor Reactions and Elliott Dialog

Entries.governorReaction5: emote Governor 40/pause 400/speak Governor "Hmmm... Well it's not bad, but it's missing something...$s#$b#Did everyone in town contribute an ingredient to the soup? I feel like it's missing someone's unique voice."/showFrame Governor 0/pause 400/showFrame Lewis 18/emote Lewis 28/pause 600/showFrame Lewis 0/pause 400/move Lewis 2 0 2/move Lewis 0 2 3/pause 500/animate Lewis false false 200 19 19 22 23 23 22 23 23 22 19 19/pause 800/playSound gulp/pause 600/playSound gulp/pause 1000/speak Lewis "You're right... It's a little bland.$s"/pause 1000/speak Lewis "Well, thanks for joining us this year, Governor. Sorry the soup wasn't anything special."/pause 500/faceDirection Lewis 2/speak Lewis "Now... who else wants some soup?"/faceDirection Marnie 0 true/advancedMove Gus false 0 -1 5 0 4 1000/advancedMove Jodi false 0 -2/advancedMove Clint false 0 1 -1 0 0 3 -2 0/advancedMove Emily false 3 0/advancedMove Pam false 0 2 7 0/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 300/message "The soup was bland, but the Potluck was still fun!"/pause 500/message "Time to head home."/waitForOtherPlayers festivalEnd/end
Entries.governorReaction3: emote Governor 32/pause 400/playMusic jaunty/speak Governor "Ah... that's a very pleasant soup. The produce from this valley never disappoints!"/showFrame Governor 0/pause 400/move Lewis 2 0 2/move Lewis 0 2 3/pause 500/animate Lewis false false 200 19 19 22 23 23 22 23 23 22 19 19/pause 800/playSound gulp/pause 600/playSound gulp/pause 1000/speak Lewis "Mmm... tasty. You all did very well today."/pause 500/faceDirection Lewis 2/speak Lewis "Now... who else wants some soup?"/faceDirection Marnie 0 true/advancedMove Gus false 0 -1 5 0 4 1000/advancedMove Jodi false 0 -2/advancedMove Clint false 0 1 -1 0 0 3 -2 0/advancedMove Emily false 3 0/advancedMove Pam false 0 2 7 0/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 300/message "The Potluck was a success! Good thing I brought something tasty for the soup."/pause 500/message "Time to head home."/waitForOtherPlayers festivalEnd/end
Entries.governorReaction2: pause 400/playMusic ocean/speak Governor "Hmm... I don't have much to say about this. It's an average soup."/showFrame Governor 0/pause 400/showFrame Lewis 18/emote Lewis 28/pause 600/showFrame Lewis 0/pause 400/move Lewis 2 0 2/move Lewis 0 2 3/pause 500/animate Lewis false false 200 19 19 22 23 23 22 23 23 22 19 19/pause 800/playSound gulp/pause 600/playSound gulp/pause 1000/speak Lewis "He's right... It's nothing special. Not bad, though."/pause 500/faceDirection Lewis 2/speak Lewis "Well... who else wants some soup?"/faceDirection Marnie 0 true/advancedMove Gus false 0 -1 5 0 4 1000/advancedMove Jodi false 0 -2/advancedMove Clint false 0 1 -1 0 0 3 -2 0/advancedMove Emily false 3 0/advancedMove Pam false 0 2 7 0/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 300/message "The soup was just average, but otherwise the Potluck was a success!"/pause 500/message "Time to head home."/waitForOtherPlayers festivalEnd/end
Entries.governorReaction1: emote Governor 28/pause 400/playMusic ocean/speak Governor "Um... It's actually kind of disgusting. I think I'll pass on the soup this year.$s"/showFrame Governor 0/pause 400/showFrame Lewis 18/emote Lewis 28/pause 600/showFrame Lewis 0/pause 400/move Lewis 2 0 2/move Lewis 0 2 3/pause 500/animate Lewis false false 200 19 19 22 23 23 22 23 23 22 19 19/pause 800/playSound gulp/pause 600/playSound gulp/pause 1000/speak Lewis "Yuck. Someone must have ruined it with a poor-quality ingredient.$s"/pause 500/faceDirection Lewis 2/speak Lewis "Well... does anyone want any?"/faceDirection Marnie 0 true/advancedMove Gus false 0 -1 5 0 4 1000/advancedMove Jodi false 0 -2/advancedMove Clint false 0 1 -1 0 0 3 -2 0/advancedMove Emily false 3 0/advancedMove Pam false 0 2 7 0/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 300/message "The soup wasn't very good, but otherwise the Potluck was a success!"/pause 500/message "Time to head home."/waitForOtherPlayers festivalEnd/end
Entries.Elliott: I woke up late, stepped out of the door and found myself in the middle of all this hubbub!#$e#I forgot that today was the Potluck.$h

Entries.summer_10: Everyone's excited for the Potluck tomorrow. Maybe a little nervous, too, considering the Governor will be here.
